name: TB-137
content:
TB-137 was the designation of a stormtrooper that served the Galactic Empire.
In 0 ABY, TB-137 was among those sent to retrieve a captured Princess Leia Organa on the planet Delaya. Upon the orders of his officer, TB-137 and his squad opened fire and killed J'er Nahj and Halle Dray, the Alderaanians who originally captured Organa. TB-137 and TB-278 were then sent to hunt down Kiro Chen, another captor of Organa that managed to escape.
